mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, nickname, pw_find_question_id, pw_find_answer, gender, height, weight, body_fat, muscle_mass, quest_due_date, quest_type) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{pwFindQuestionId}, #{pwFindQuestionAnswer}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bodyFat}, #{muscleMass}, #{questDueDate}, #{questType})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, pw_find_question_id = #{pwFindQuestionId}, pw_find_question_answer = #{pwFindQuestionAnswer}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, body_fat = #{bodyFat}, muscle_mass = #{muscleMass}, quest_due_date = #{questDueDate}, quest_type = #{questType}, quest_modify_cnt = #{questModifyCnt} WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT U.seq, U.email, U.password, U.name, U.nickname, P.question, U.pw_find_answer, U.height, U.weight, U.body_fat, U.muscle_mass, U.quest_due_date, U.quest_type, U.quest_modify_cnt FROM user U, pw_find_question_list P WHERE U.pw_find_question_id = P.id and U.seq = #{seq}
